channel.title: Posts on KXSEVEN
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on KXSEVEN

item.title: Here are awesome things and here is how to use them
item.description: I have yet to have a meeting with an IaaS vendor that has managed to communicate that they truly understand the needs of large enterprise when it comes to technology adoption.

item.title: The big 'C' Pattern
item.description:
Cancer: An abnormal growth of cells which tend to proliferate in an uncontrolled way and, in some cases, to metastasize (spread).
— www.medicinenet.com

A term for diseases in which abnormal cells divide without control and can invade nearby tissues. Cancer cells can also spread to other parts of the body through the blood and lymph systems.
— www.cancer.gov

Is there an uncomfortable overlap with our relationship with AWS?

item.title: The answer is not 'more AWS'
item.description:
One of the hallmarks of a good politician is that when asked a question, instead of answering your question they answer one of their own, and in doing so control the conversation in the direction of their desired outcome.

Sound familiar? It should be.
